author: Marco Fioretti
description:
In an exclusive conversation, newly minted Percona CEO Peter Farkas explains why the company’s open source-first approach still works -- and how he plans to build on it across global teams and new database fronts.

The post Percona’s New CEO Peter Farkas Returns to a Company He Never Really Left appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: Percona’s New CEO Peter Farkas Returns to a Company He Never Really Left
